short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto select web tab to show old style web results on google.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of Google Search occasionally defaulting to AI summaries and meaningless overviews? Worry no more! On Web is a minimalist Chrome extension that ensures your search results always start with the Web tab selected.

How?
This handy tool uses basic JavaScript to monitor your search results page and automatically clicks the "Web" tab if something else sneaks its way in. No more accidental image searches when you just want plain ol’ text-based results like old Google!

Why?
Because every second counts. ⏱️ Think about it: this extension saves you an entire second (or even less!) every time you search! That’s one more second to sip your coffee ☕, pet your dog 🐶, or daydream about world domination 🌍.

Who knew that shaving off a single second from your search routine could feel so satisfying? 😌 Install On Web today and become the search efficiency ninja you were born to be. 🥷✨

🚀 Efficiency, one second at a time!
